com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.utils

Class ChunkUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.utils.ChunkUtil
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    WorldUtil

    public class ChunkUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains utilities to get and set chunks of a world

      • isChunkAvailable

        public static boolean isChunkAvailable(org.bukkit.World world,
                                       int x,
                                       int z)
        Gets whether a given chunk is readily available. If this method returns False, the chunk is not yet generated.
        Parameters:
        world - the chunk is in
        x - - coordinate of the chunk
        z - - coordinate of the chunk
        Returns:
        True if the chunk can be obtained without generating it, False if not

      • getChunks

        public static java.util.Collection<org.bukkit.Chunk> getChunks(org.bukkit.World world)
        Gets all the chunks loaded on a given world
        Parameters:
        world - to get the loaded chunks from
        Returns:
        Loaded chunks

      • getChunk

        public static org.bukkit.Chunk getChunk(org.bukkit.World world,
                                        int x,
                                        int z)
        Gets a chunk from a world without loading or generating it. This method guarantees no event will be generated at all trying to get this chunk. If the chunk is not loaded, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        world - to obtain the chunk from
        x - - coordinate of the chunk
        z - - coordinate of the chunk
        Returns:
        The chunk, or null if it is not loaded

      • getChunkAsync

        public static void getChunkAsync(org.bukkit.World world,
                                 int x,
                                 int z,
                                 java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Gets, loads or generated a chunk without loading or generating it on the main thread. Allows the lazy-loading of chunks without locking the server.
        Parameters:
        world - to obtain the chunk from
        x - - coordinate of the chunk
        z - - coordinate of the chunk
        runnable - to execute once the chunk is loaded or obtained

      • saveChunk

        public static void saveChunk(org.bukkit.Chunk chunk)
        Saves a single chunk to disk. This method is only valid for chunks that are loaded. Unloaded chunks should not be saved (again).
        Parameters:
        chunk - to save

      • needsSaving

        public static boolean needsSaving(org.bukkit.Chunk chunk)
        Gets whether a chunk needs to be saved
        Parameters:
        chunk - to check
        Returns:
        True if it needs to be saved, False if not
